radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild atelectasis at the lung bases, scarring on the right, moderate hiatal hernia, mild pectus excavatum, increased size of appendix to 9 mm with wall hyperemia and mild surrounding fat stranding, stomach distended, mild fatty infiltration of the pancreas, small bowel loops mildly prominent without obstruction, no biliary ductal dilatation, bilateral ureteral jets visualized, scattered calcifications in abdominal aorta and iliac arteries.
